Token.Abstract: An RKRouter instance is responsible for generating NSURL objects with a given base URL and a route set. It is used to centralize the knowledge about the URL's that are used by the application.
Initializes a router with a given base URL.

Parameter.Name: baseURL
Parameter.Abstract: The base URL with which to initialize the receiver.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The receiver, initialized with the given base URL.

Token.Abstract: Generates a URL for the route with the given name.

Parameter.Name: routeName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the route for which a URL is to be generated.

Parameter.Name: method
Parameter.Abstract: A pointer to an RKRequestMethod variable in which to store the HTTP method associated with the named route. May be nil.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: An optional object against which to interpolate the path pattern.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new NSURL object constructed by appending the path pattern to the baseURL of the receiver and interpolating against a given object; or nil if no route was found with the given name.

Token.Abstract: Generates a URL for a given object and HTTP method.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: The object for which a URL is to be generated.

Parameter.Name: method
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP method for which the URL is to be generated.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new URL object constructed by appending the path pattern of the route for the object an HTTP method to the baseURL of the receiver, interpolated against the routed object; or nil if no route was found for the given object and HTTP method.

Token.Abstract: Generates a URL for a relationship of a given object with a given HTTP method.

Parameter.Name: relationshipName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the relationship for which a URL is to be generated.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: The object for which the URL is to be generated.

Parameter.Name: method
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP method for which the URL is to be generated.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new URL object constructed by appending the path pattern of the route for the given object's relationship and HTTP method to the baseURL of the receiver, interpolated against the routed object; or nil if no route was found for the given relationship, object and HTTP method.

Token.Abstract: Generates a URL with a given route and object.

Parameter.Name: route
Parameter.Abstract: The route to generate the URL with.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: The object with which to interpolate the path pattern of the given route.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new URL object constructed by interpolating the path pattern of the given route with the given object to construct a path and constructing an NSURL object relative to the baseURL of the receiver.

Token.Abstract: The base URL that all URLs constructed by the receiver are relative to.
The base URL that all URLs constructed by the receiver are relative to.
A route set defining all the routes addressable through the receiver.
A route set defining all the routes addressable through the receiver.
